member.name: T:RationalLib.Rational
member.summary: Struct being used for calculation in rational numbers.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a rational number in base cast.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.op_Equality(RationalLib.Rational,RationalLib.Rational)
member.summary: Compares values of two rational numbers.
member.returns: Confirmation if values of two rational numbers are equal.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.op_Inequality(RationalLib.Rational,RationalLib.Rational)
member.summary: Compares values of two rational numbers.
member.returns: Confirmation if values of two rational numbers are not equal.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.op_GreaterThan(RationalLib.Rational,RationalLib.Rational)
member.summary: Compares values of two rational numbers.
member.returns: Confirmation if value of first rational number is higher than the other one.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.op_LessThan(RationalLib.Rational,RationalLib.Rational)
member.summary: Compares values of two rational numbers.
member.returns: Confirmation if value of first rational number is lower than the other one.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares rational number to other object.
member.returns: Confirmation if object is instance of Rational and has same values as this rational number.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets hash code of rational number.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.ToString
member.summary: Gets string representation of rational number.

member.name: M:RationalLib.Rational.ProcessNegative
member.summary: get rid of negative sign if both numerator and denominator are negative
